message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item of immense value, and we believe it represents a fair and competitive price in today's market. We understand its worth to you is $1000000, but we hope this proposal will be agreeable to you. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or if you have any questions.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on your product, but I'm afraid I need to make a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is $1000000. I hope we can come to a mutually agreeable price.
